edu.cmu.sphinx.trainer

Class Edge

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cmu.sphinx.trainer.Edge

  • public class Edge
extends Object
    Defines the basic Edge for any graph A generic graph edge must have a destination Node and an identifier.
